item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, November 6, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Private Cloud Compute Security Guide (127 points | 44 comments)
2. Show HN: Hacker News frontpage as a print newspaper that you can personalize (45 points | 12 comments)
3. Show HN: SuperSplat – open-source 3D Gaussian Splat Editor (120 points | 27 comments)

8. Switch 2 will be backwards compatible with Switch, Nintendo confirms (90 points | 54 comments)

10. Kernel optimization with BOLT (binary optimization and layout tool) (77 points | 4 comments)
11. AMD Ryzen 7 9800X3D Linux Performance: Zen 5 With 3D V-Cache (62 points | 27 comments)

14. 98.css – A design system for building faithful recreations of old UIs (248 points | 60 comments)

18. Only 5.3% of US welders are women. After years as a professor, I became one (159 points | 207 comments)

20. Why the deep learning boom caught almost everyone by surprise (169 points | 107 comments)
21. Defibrillation devices save lives using 1k times less electricity (87 points | 52 comments)
22. EU opens antitrust investigation into anticompetitive practices by Corning (60 points | 13 comments)
23. It's raining PFAS in South Florida – study (39 points | 9 comments)
24. Superstreamer – OSS streaming toolkit from video source to player (131 points | 7 comments)
25. GoToSocial WASM-based SQLite driver and BSD (51 points | 1 comment)
26. Now lie in it: an uxntal retrospective (39 points | 8 comments)
27. Tracker Beeper (2022) (359 points | 66 comments)

29. What Shapes Do Matrix Multiplications Like? (135 points | 6 comments)
